short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the Kick.com color scheme to any color!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple yet effective extension. Change the color scheme of the site Kick.com to any color in a color picker.

Please let me know of any bugs or things I forgot to recolor.

Instructions:
After installing, locate the extension in your extensions. Click it and enable it. Change the color with the change color button which opens a color picker. Refresh site after choosing color or enabling/disabling.
